analysis.description:
Crowdsale.hasBalance (/unique_chucks/14/0x57bfffd48366f78e787e167419c8c05cdb849ede.sol#604-615) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- allocatedIndex[_beneficiary].length > 0 && _releaseDate == allocatedIndex[_beneficiary][allocated[_beneficiary][_releaseDate].index]

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.endCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/14/0x57bfffd48366f78e787e167419c8c05cdb849ede.sol#768-799):
	External calls:
	- ! token.unlock() (/unique_chucks/14/0x57bfffd48366f78e787e167419c8c05cdb849ede.sol#778-779)
	- totalTokenSupply = token.totalSupply() + allocatedTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0x57bfffd48366f78e787e167419c8c05cdb849ede.sol#780-781)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allocatedTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0x57bfffd48366f78e787e167419c8c05cdb849ede.sol#787-791)

GLACrowdsale.retreiveTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0x57bfffd48366f78e787e167419c8c05cdb849ede.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenInstance.transfer(beneficiary,tokenBalance) (/unique_chucks/14/0x57bfffd48366f78e787e167419c8c05cdb849ede.sol)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.endCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/14/0x57bfffd48366f78e787e167419c8c05cdb849ede.sol#768-799):
	External calls:
	- ! token.unlock() (/unique_chucks/14/0x57bfffd48366f78e787e167419c8c05cdb849ede.sol#778-779)
	- totalTokenSupply = token.totalSupply() + allocatedTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0x57bfffd48366f78e787e167419c8c05cdb849ede.sol#780-781)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allocated (/unique_chucks/14/0x57bfffd48366f78e787e167419c8c05cdb849ede.sol#787-791)
	- allocated (/unique_chucks/14/0x57bfffd48366f78e787e167419c8c05cdb849ede.sol#798-799)
	- allocatedEth (/unique_chucks/14/0x57bfffd48366f78e787e167419c8c05cdb849ede.sol#798-799)
	- allocatedIndex (/unique_chucks/14/0x57bfffd48366f78e787e167419c8c05cdb849ede.sol#787-791)
	- allocatedIndex (/unique_chucks/14/0x57bfffd48366f78e787e167419c8c05cdb849ede.sol#798-799)
